import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go

source.79083216:
wins_matches=groupedBy[groupedBy.runs_x > groupedBy.runs_y]
loss_matches=groupedBy[groupedBy.runs_x < groupedBy.runs_y]
draw_matches=groupedBy[groupedBy.runs_x == groupedBy.runs_y]
source.b1924508:
wins_matchs_count=wins_matches['battingTeam_x'].value_counts()
loss_matchs_count=loss_matches['battingTeam_x'].value_counts()
draw_matchs_count=draw_matches['battingTeam_x'].value_counts()
draw_matchs_count["Bangladesh"]=0
draw_matchs_count["Australia"]=0
draw_matchs_count["South Africa"]=0
draw_matchs_count["Afghanistan"]=0
draw_matchs_count["Zimbabwe"]=0
source.030b15d1:
# for simply sort by team name
total_play=sorted([(name, match) for name,match in zip(total_matchs_played.index , total_matchs_played.values)])
total_win=sorted([(name, match) for name,match in zip(wins_matchs_count.index , wins_matchs_count.values)])
total_loss=sorted([(name, match) for name,match in zip(loss_matchs_count.index , loss_matchs_count.values)])
total_draw=sorted([(name, match) for name,match in zip(draw_matchs_count.index , draw_matchs_count.values)])
source.2983ad7e:
#create overall DataFrame
over_all=pd.DataFrame()
over_all['Team Name']=[name[0] for name in total_play]
over_all['total_matches_played']=[match[1] for match in total_play]
over_all['win_matches']=[match[1] for match in total_win]
over_all['loss_matches']=[match[1] for match in total_loss]
over_all['draw_matches']=[match[1] for match in total_draw]
source.a74944f4:
team=over_all['Team Name']
maxx_value=max(over_all['total_matches_played'].tolist())
colors1 = ['lightslategray',] * 13
colors1[over_all['total_matches_played'].tolist().index(maxx_value)] = 'crimson'
fig = go.Figure(data=[
    go.Bar(name='over_all', x=team, y=over_all['total_matches_played'],text=over_all['total_matches_played'],textposition='auto',marker_color=colors1)
])
# Change the bar mode
fig.update_layout(barmode='overlay',
                 title='Top cricket team playing the most matches in T20 career')
fig.show()

source.d50da738:
team=over_all['Team Name']

fig = go.Figure(data=[
    go.Bar(name='total_play', x=team, y=over_all['total_matches_played'],text=over_all['total_matches_played'],textposition='auto'),
    go.Bar(name='total_wins', x=team, y=over_all['win_matches'],text=over_all['win_matches'],textposition='auto'),
    go.Bar(name='total_loss', x=team, y=over_all['loss_matches'],text=over_all['loss_matches'],textposition='auto'),
    go.Bar(name='total_draw', x=team, y=over_all['draw_matches'],text=over_all['draw_matches'],textposition='auto')
  
])
# Change the bar mode
fig.update_layout(barmode='overlay',
                 title="Overall matches summaries in 'T20 International Crickets Matches'")
fig.show()
source.ade7d5b9:
fig = go.Figure(data=[
    go.Bar(name='Total faced balls', x=first_inn_summaries.index, y=first_inn_summaries['balls'],text=first_inn_summaries['balls'],textposition='auto'),
    go.Bar(name='Total collected runs', x=first_inn_summaries.index, y=first_inn_summaries['runs'],text=first_inn_summaries['runs'],textposition='auto'),
    go.Bar(name='Total wickets lost', x=first_inn_summaries.index, y=first_inn_summaries['player_out'],text=first_inn_summaries['player_out'],textposition='auto')
])
# Change the bar mode
fig.update_layout(barmode='stack',
                 title='Overall observation in the first inning')
fig.show()

source.a7ad8aed:
maxx_count_venue=max(match_count_with_venue.total_match.tolist())
colors6 = ['lightslategray',]*len(match_count_with_venue.total_match.tolist())
colors6[match_count_with_venue.total_match.tolist().index(maxx_count_venue)] = 'crimson'

fig = go.Figure(data=[
    go.Bar(name='Total Matches', x=match_count_with_venue.venue, y=match_count_with_venue.total_match,text=match_count_with_venue.total_match,textposition='auto',marker_color=colors6)
])
# Change the bar mode
fig.update_layout(barmode='relative',
                 title='Number of matches per International Stadium ')
fig.show()
